definitions.definition: The art or act of cultivating; improvement of land for or by agriculture
definitions.example: The heavy cultivation of the hillside led to soil erosion.

definitions.definition: The state of being cultivated or used for agriculture
Devotion of time or attention to the improvement of (something)
definitions.example: His steadfast cultivation of their relationship finally bore fruit.

definitions.definition: Advancement or refinement in physical, intellectual, or moral condition
definitions.example: She is a woman of great cultivation.
